title: Verify smooth scrolling synchronization with GSAP ScrollTrigger
description: Ensure that the Lenis-based smooth scrolling synchronizes accurately with GSAP ScrollTrigger animations without jitter or desynchronization across desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the homepage on desktop browser
Observe scrolling behavior and GSAP animations for smoothness and synchronization
Scrolling is fluid without jitter, and GSAP animations trigger exactly in sync with scroll position
Repeat the above steps on a mobile device with screen size 320px-375px
Scrolling and animations are smooth and synchronized on mobile as well

title: Particle globe canvas performance and rendering correctness
description: Verify the particle globe hero section canvas renders correctly with high particle density, continent highlighting, and intro animations, maintaining near 60 FPS on low-end mobile devices.

steps.description: Load the homepage on multiple devices, including a low-end mobile device
Particle globe is fully rendered with all continents highlighted correctly
Intro animations play smoothly without frame drops
Measured frame rate remains close to 60 FPS during interaction and animation playback

title: Responsive navigation and language toggle functionality
description: Check responsive navigation header behavior including sticky header on scroll, language toggle functionality (Korean/English), and mobile drawer with outside-click close on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Open the homepage on desktop and verify sticky header behavior when scrolling down
Header remains sticky and visible on scroll
Use the language toggle to switch between Korean and English
Page language changes accordingly with correct text translations and layout adjustments
Open the mobile navigation drawer on small screen device
Mobile drawer opens and menu items are accessible
Click outside the mobile drawer area
Mobile drawer closes properly

title: Language switch layout and content integrity
description: Verify that toggling languages between Korean and English does not break or misalign the UI layout or truncate text in any section.

steps.description: Navigate through all website sections (Hero, Vision & Value, Bento Grid, How It Moves, Economy & Revenue, Footer)
Toggle language from Korean to English and vice versa repeatedly
No UI breakage, overlapped or truncated text, or misaligned elements occur
All translated text matches expected strings in each language

title: Glassmorphism contrast and text legibility
description: Validate that glassmorphism UI elements maintain sufficient contrast and legibility of text over patterned and translucent backgrounds in Vision & Value, Economy & Revenue sections.

steps.description: Inspect glassmorphism cards and backgrounds on Vision & Value and Economy & Revenue Share sections
Contrast ratio between text and backgrounds meets WCAG AA or better standards
Text remains clearly readable on all tested device types and screen brightness settings

title: Keyboard navigation and accessibility compliance
description: Ensure all interactive elements including navigation, language toggle, mobile drawer, tabs in How It Moves section, and footer links support keyboard navigation with visible focus states and accessible ARIA labels.

steps.description: Use keyboard only to navigate through the site interactive elements
Tab order is logical and intuitive across all sections
All actionable elements have visible focus outlines while focused
ARIA labels and roles are present and correct for navigation, language toggle, mobile drawer, tabs, and footer social links

title: Responsive text and grid layout on small screen sizes
description: Test the website layout on small screen widths (320px-375px) to ensure text is legible, grid elements in Bento Grid remain visible without overflow, and no horizontal scroll occurs.

steps.description: Resize browser window to common mobile widths (320px, 360px, 375px) or use actual devices
Text remains legible and no clipping or overflow occurs
Bento Grid layout adapts properly without horizontal scroll or content cutoff

title: No scroll locking issue when navigation menu is open on mobile
description: Verify that opening the mobile navigation drawer does not lock the scroll of the page unexpectedly or cause layout shifts on mobile devices.

steps.description: Open mobile navigation drawer on a small screen mobile device
Page behind drawer does not scroll or locks scrolling only when appropriate
Close the drawer and verify the page scroll behavior returns to normal

title: Cross-browser compatibility including iOS Safari support
description: Test the entire site across major browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari on macOS, Windows, Android, and especially iOS Safari, focusing on backdrop-filter, canvas transparency, and GSAP animations.

steps.description: Open the site on latest Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari Desktop and iOS Safari
Backdrop-filter glassmorphism effects render correctly without visual glitches
Canvas particle globe renders with proper transparency and visuals
GSAP animations are smooth and synchronized with scrolling

title: Font loading and prevention of layout shifts
description: Ensure font resources load efficiently without causing layout shifts or flickering of text content after page load.

steps.description: Load the homepage and observe text rendering during page load
Fonts load without visible flicker or flash of unstyled text (FOUT)
No layout shifting or jumping of text occurs once fonts are fully loaded

title: GSAP context cleanup verification on page transitions
description: Confirm that GSAP animation contexts are properly cleaned up during page transitions to prevent memory leaks or animation duplication.

steps.description: Navigate between pages multiple times in a session
No duplicated animations or increased memory usage is observed
GSAP animations initialize fresh without interference from previous page instances

title: Footer accessibility and scroll-to-top functionality
description: Validate that footer corporate info, accessible social links with proper aria-labels, and scroll-to-top button function correctly and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Scroll to footer section on desktop and mobile
Corporate info is displayed with semantic markup
Social media links have aria-label attributes describing the link purpose
Use keyboard and mouse to activate scroll-to-top button
Page scrolls instantly back to top without issues
